name: WOXAPP
tagline: Mobile applications for startups and businesses
description:
WOXAPP develops mobile applications for startups and businesses. We make native iOS and Android apps and implement the back-end part, combining design, technologies, and our expertise to make your ideas turn into products. 
Since 2011 we have implemented over 50 projects. We have experience in creating high-load systems. We understand what MVP is and why it’s important to release the product as soon as possible and to work on KPIs. 
We use agile methodology and arrange the process most transparently. You participate in and control every stage of the development.
We set the analytics and help with publishing applications. We pay a special attention to business logics and interface design.
We create:
- Native mobile applications for iOS and Android. 
- MVP for startups.
- Mobile applications for businesses.
- API and web-applications. 
 
Do you want to have your idea implemented? Email us at cost@woxapp.com
